sentence: place the rear purple block diagonally in front of the purple and blue blocks you moved before
pick up the rear purple block and place it diagonally in front of the purple and blue blocks around the center
move the rearmost purple block so that one corner touches the front right corner of the purple block you just moved
move the rear purple block so that one corner touches the front right corner of the left purple block
move the purple block you did not touch yet to the front right corner of the block you just moved
